text: “ Earth to Gwyneth, ” reads the cover line on Goop ’ s first ever print issue. They took that literally : The cover features the lifestyle site ’ s founder and CEO, Gwyneth Paltrow, topless and slathered in mud from head to toe. The 96 - page magazine debut, which retails for a hefty price ( like all things Goop ) of $ 15, is the first iteration of a new quarterly publication. Just like the online brand, the book will feature wellness advice, clean beauty secrets, healthy recipes and more.
